New ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs In My Bag?‚Äô episode with @platurn!

Platurn, the Bay Area DJ, producer & founder of @the45sessions, goes record shopping at Amoeba San Francisco. He digs for classic hip hop, soul, electronic & progressive rock records, and talks about the album that was a spiritual moment for him as a producer.

üëâ Watch the full video at YouTube.com/Amoeba

detailedPosts.caption:
Amoeba Hollywood on Instagram: "WE üíú MN

Our friends at the iconic Minneapolis record store @electricfetusmpls need our help! The recent horrific events have left the Minneapolis community reeling and in desperate need of our support.

Starting this Friday, February 13th, two Electric Fetus T-shirt designs will be available for $25 at @amoebaberkeley, @amoebasf & @amoebahollywood -- and all proceeds will go directly to Electric Fetus!

You can represent a beloved record store and provide some much-needed support for their community.

üíª Can't make it to an Amoeba store? Visit electricfetus.com.

üôè Thanks to our printers @freegoldwatch in the Bay Area and @familyindustries in LA!"

Amoeba San Francisco on Instagram: "TODAY, 2/13, 5PM:  Get a special preview of #RSD26 releases at our @recordstoredayus List Launch listening party, powered by @marshall, at Amoeba SF!

Come hear tracks from select Record Store Day 2026 titles before anyone else. Plus, free swag for all attendees from Marshall and a raffle for your chance to win a pair of Marshall headphones, a Marshall portable speaker, $25 Amoeba gift certificates & more goodies!

** Free/all-ages event.
** No purchase or RSVP necessary to attend.
** Limit 1 raffle ticket per person.
** Must be present to win.
** Giveaways are limited and available while supplies last.

Our sister stores @amoebaberkeley and @amoebahollywood are having the same event at 5pm today!

#ListenTogether #ListLaunch #RecordStoreDay"

Amoeba San Francisco on Instagram: "Get 15% Off your Amoeba.com order with code: FEB15 today and tomorrow (Feb 12-13, 2026).

Music & movies ship free to the U.S.!
Discount available for Amoeba.com online orders only (not for use in-store)."

Amoeba San Francisco on Instagram: "‚ú®GIVEAWAY!  Night 1 of the @metric, @brokensocialscene, @montrealstars All The Feelings Tour stop at @sfmasonic sold out, but they added a second night and we are giving away tickets to that 6/22/26 show!

To Enter:
Follow us, and tag your concert friend.
Contest ends Friday, 2/13 at 5pm.
Winner will be notified directly.

Tickets for the Live 105: All The Feelings Tour are available at:
https://www.livenation.com/event/G5vYZ_dwMpEjG/live-105-all-the-feelings-tour-w-metric-broken-social-scene-stars"

Amoeba Hollywood on Instagram: "To celebrate Black History Month, Amoeba Music and @audiotechnicausa are teaming up to give three lucky winners a new turntable and wireless speaker, PLUS some classic vinyl from @universalmusicgroup! üé∂

One winner from each Amoeba location will get an Audio-Technica Automatic Wireless Turntable and Bluetooth Speaker, plus iconic vinyl records by @thedangelo, @ninasimone, @johncoltrane, @bobmarley, @ettajamesofficial, @theroots, @officialmarvingayemusic & @publicenemy.

üëâ Enter to win at Amoeba.com/BHMcontest

[Contest ends 2/19/2026.]
.
.
.
#AudioTechnica #BlackHistoryMonth #AmoebaMusic #UniversalMusic"

Amoeba San Francisco on Instagram: "üö® UPDATE:  WE HAVE A WINNER!  Thank you all.

GIVEAWAY!  Win 2 tickets to @noahkahanmusic with @gigi4perez at @oraclepark 8/21/26 before they go on sale this Thursday! 

TO ENTER:
Follow us, and @livenationnorcal, then tag your plus one!
Contest ends Thursday 2/12 at 9am (before tickets go on sale at 12pm). 
Winner will be notified directly, so watch your DMs!"

Amoeba San Francisco on Instagram: "Amoeba Music & @supershangrilashow (of Bigfoot Bonanza, Space Visitors & Ghost Fest) co-present The Fear & Faith Horror Film Festival, a two-night event taking place at the historic @theorindatheatre Friday, February 20th & Saturday, February 21st. From ‚ÄúDef By Temptation‚Äù to ‚ÄúAlucarda,‚Äù the festival explores more than ten horror films and shorts in which religious faith is a central theme rather than just a supernatural plot device.
Tickets & info: https://fearandfaithfest.com/"
Amoeba San Francisco on Instagram: "üåÇ @1umbrellaofficial album release party with @empire today ‚òîÔ∏è. Big love to all the fans, friends, & family that came out!"

Amoeba San Francisco on Instagram: "The @1umbrellaofficial collective (representing Frisco & the Town), @zaybang, @lilbean , @yee, @22ndjim, & @whoisallblack will be at Amoeba SF tomorrow, Saturday, 2/7 at 1pm signing their brand new album and taking photos with fans. 

Purchase your copy of the 1 UMBRELLA CD (@empire) at Amoeba SF (we have it before anyone else!) to attend the event."
Amoeba San Francisco on Instagram: "Just in time for the Bad Bunny Bowl here in the Bay Area!  @badbunnypr‚Äôs album, DEBI TIRAR M√ÅS FOTOS, dropped on vinyl today."
